Title: Beef Ragu with Warm Spices
Directions: Microwave onion, tomato paste, oil, garlic, cinnamon and cloves in bowl, stirring occasionally, until onion is softened, about 5 minutes; transfer to slow cooker. Stir in tomato puree and soy sauce. Nestle ribs into slow cooker. Cover and cook until beef is tender, 8-9 hours on low or 5-6 hours on high.
Boil the pasta.Using large spoon, skim fat from surface of the sauce. Pull bones out of ribs and smash rib meat into sauce with fork.
